text: Rimini is a city in the region of Emilia-Romagna in Italy. It is also the capital of the Province of Rimini. About 138,000 people live in Rimini. Rimini is a popular seaside resort known for its bars and nightclubs. It has a humid subtropical climate (Cfa in the KÃ¶ppen climate classification). == References == Category:Capital cities in Italy
title: Rimini
